subject: Horse Racing
Horses
Breeders' Cup (Horse Race)
lead_paragraph: Somebeachsomewhere, at 3-5, was the lowest-priced favorite in the Breeders Crown on Saturday night at the Meadowlands Racetrack. The eight Breeders Crown races for 2- and 3-year-olds, worth a combined $4.9 million, will determine divisional champions and Horse of the Year. Somebeachsomewhere, who has won 13 of 14 races this season, has post No. 3 in the 3-year-old Colt Pace. Deweycheatumnhowe, the other leading Horse of the Year candidate, has post No. 8 as the 6-5 favorite in the 3-year-old Colt Trot.
snippet: Somebeachsomewhere, at 3-5, was the lowest-priced favorite in the Breeders Crown on Saturday night at the Meadowlands Racetrack. The eight Breeders Crown races for 2- and 3-year-olds, worth a combined $4.9 million, will determine divisional champions...
